column5: You are just being polite acknowledging the young lady. The view is free and is much appreciated by me anyways. Ask your "better half" when a polite good looking man in skimpy cutoffs goes by would she view the assets or ignore them....make sure shes being honest. I have witnessed first hand a pile of ladies with male strippers and they are as friskey as men can be................
any one have any experiences at the st louis hotel in thunder bay
Anybody know a place in Gananoque by TI crossing?
going to lake wabaskang in sept. inter. falls to dryden to the camp.are there any must see shows along the way on that part of road.let me know we love to spend money. p.s. hows the fishing
What date are you going and where are you staying on Wabaskang?
first week of sept. at parkview
We are going up the second week and staying at Lundy's. We have always done really well up there. Can't wait.....
Do you mean you always do good with the Strippers, if so I can understand why you can,t wait to go!!!
Thought you were asking about stripers at first glance. Oh well, the strippers are easier to come by and look better.
Terry,Check in Dryden if the Dryden House still offers nightly Dancing, They did some years back, and the gals were wonderfullllll......

This afternoon, while I was working in the front yard, an exceptional young lady in a halter top and short shorts walked by. She looked, I smiled and nodded, she gave a quick smile and kept on with her power walk. There came a catty remark from elsewhere in the yard (guess who). Well I ain't dead yet, and even though I am a grandfather, I still will be distracted by certain sights. If the "better half" (sometimes I wonder about the better part) would strip down and party more often, maybe I wouldn't be tempted to look as much as I do.
